full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Number: WS4343328050
#### Solicitation Number: WS4343328050

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Offers for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of custom fit decibel blocking ear protection for CH148 maintenance personnel at 12 Wing Shearwater, in Shearwater, Nova Scotia.

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) and Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) are seeking to procure custom ear protection that will provide adequate protection to personnel conducting maintenance activities. The successful Offeror shall be required to conduct necessary fittings and provide the specified custom fit ear protection.

#### Tender Status
The tender has expired and the closing date has passed.

#### Important Tender Information

*   The tender closing date has been amended to April 2nd, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
*   All responses must be submitted by the tender closing date to be considered.
*   Incomplete or late submissions will be declared non-responsive and will not be considered.

#### Tender Requirements
*   Contract span: March 31st, 2031.
*   Contract start date: N/A.
*   Competitive - Open bidding method.

#### Preference Criteria
 Lowest price.

#### Brand/Src Fituga Restricted Goods Listing
	
None.

#### Special Processing Fees

None.

#### Regional Delivery
 The specified custom ear protection will be delivered to 12 Wing Shearwater, in Shearwater, Nova Scotia.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Kendra Boroczki from the PSPC at:
kendra.boroczki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the "Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)". 

#### Regions of Opportunity
None.

#### Region of Lifecycle
 Nova Scotia.
